text: @BarackObama @JoeBiden Wow Obama you do not deserve to be called president it is coming out in 2015 you gave China a grant for $3.7 million for the coronavirus and they turned it into a bio weapon . you used our tax money from This bio weapon you should be ashamed of yourself
